H0.text: Sixty year old Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner is the current president of which South American country . Argentina

H1.text: Sixty year old Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner is the current president of which South American country . Chile

H2.text: Sixty year old Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner is the current president of which South American country . Colombia

H3.text: Sixty year old Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner is the current president of which South American country . Argie

A4.text: Cristina Fernández de Kirchner served as the 56th President of Argentina from 2007 to 2015.

A5.text: later as the 37th Vice President of Argentina under President Alberto Fernández from 2019 to 2023.

A6.text: The current president Javier Milei was sworn into office on 10 December 2023.

A8.text: The November 2023 election run-off ended in a win for libertarian outsider Javier Milei with 55.7% of the vote against 44.4% to ruling coalition candidate Sergio Massa.

A9.text: He did not run for reelection, promoting instead the candidacy of his wife, senator Cristina Kirchner who won the 2007 and 2011 elections.

A10.text: She ran as senator of Santa Cruz with Citizen's Unity and won.

A11.text: In October 2025, President Javier Milei's party, La Libertad Avanza, won a landslide victory in midterm elections, making it easier for Milei to push ahead with his programme of radical spending cuts and free-market reforms.
